name: Dragonfly S3 Server
description: Separate Dragonfly S3 processing and serving from your main app.

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS region in which the S3 bucket resides.

DRAGONFLY_SECRET.description: The Dragonfly secret key that protects against DOS attacks - shared with the main app.

DRAGONFLY_URL_FORMAT.description: The Dragonfly asset path - must match `url_format` in the main app.

S3_BUCKET.description: The name of your S3 bucket.

WEB_THREADS.description: The number of threads per web process.
